newsitem.title: JAPAN: Mos Food to buy back up to 3.47 mln shrs.
newsitem.headline: Mos Food to buy back up to 3.47 mln shrs.

text.p: Hamburger chain operator Mos Food Services Inc said on Thursday that it plans to buy back up to 3.47 million of its own shares.
The plan needs to be approved by a shareholders' meeting scheduled for June 27, Mos Food said.
